table.name: vtiger_sitevalidationmasking
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_sitevalidationmasking` ( `sitevalidationmaskingid` int NOT NULL, `sitevm_2d` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `sitevm_3d` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `sitevm_alongwith` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `sitevm_alone` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `sitevm_docreceived` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `sitevm_prepare` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `sitevm_description1` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `sitevm_alongwith1` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `sitevm_alone1` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `sitevm_scopework` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `sitevm_comments` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `sitevm_no` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`sitevalidationmaskingid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb3

table.name: vtiger_sitevalidationmaskingcf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_sitevalidationmaskingcf` ( `sitevalidationmaskingid` int NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`sitevalidationmaskingid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb3
